mcp_servers.description: MCP servers available in Claude Code session
mcp_servers.note: MCP servers are session-based and provided by Claude Code, not stored in config files

available.name: ide-diagnostics
available.description: Get language diagnostics from VS Code

available.name: ide-execute-code
available.description: Execute python code in the Jupyter kernel for the current notebook file

mcp_servers.integration_strategy: MCP tools are accessed directly by Claude Code and do not require workflow engine integration

workflow_engine_skills.description: Skills installed in the workflow engine

skills.name: code-formatter
skills.description: Format source files consistently across languages

skills.description: Detect documentation drift between source and docs

skills.description: Inspect cloud usage patterns and surface cost saving opportunities

skills.description: Validate and clean workflow engine memory artifacts

skills.description: Perform natural language code search over the repository

skills.description: Identify and run relevant tests for a change set

workflow_engine_skills.action_required: Update skill-manifest.json with metadata for all 30 skills

agent_dispatcher_mappings.action_required: Expand agent mappings to include more Claude Code agent types

actions.impact: Enable automatic skill routing for all installed skills

actions.details: Add mappings for 62 additional Claude Code agents
Auto-detect skills from directories and generate manifest entries
Auto-detect Claude Code agents and generate dispatcher mappings
Add MCP tool awareness to auto-behavior system
actions.impact: Better tool selection guidance for Claude

actions.details: Merge user's existing skills/agents with repo defaults during installation
